termsAndConditions.label: I accept the Terms and Conditions

validation.acceptTerms: You must accept the terms and conditions

profile.profileDescription: Manage your profile information to secure your account
profile.usernameNote: Username can only be changed once
profile.name: Name

home.ctaDescription: You're ready to start a new project? Contact us now!
home.standardConsultantDescription: Get a detailed beauty analysis based on your responses to a comprehensive beauty questionnaire.
home.premiumConsultantDescription: Experience a live, one-on-one video consultation with an expert, tailored to address your specific beauty goals.
home.title: Your Trusted Beauty Destination
home.description: Discover authentic beauty products and personalized expert advice in one trusted platform.
home.heroSubtitle: Allure is a comprehensive system for beauty product sales and makeup consultation services.
home.featuresSubtitle: We're transforming the online beauty shopping experience with trust and expertise
home.feature1Description: Every product on our platform is verified and sourced directly from official brands, eliminating the risk of counterfeits.
home.feature2Description: Connect with certified beauty professionals for personalized advice tailored to your unique needs and preferences.
home.feature3Description: We carefully select high-quality products, cutting through the noise to help you find what truly works.
home.problemDescription: The online beauty market is overwhelming with endless options, unreliable information, and the risk of fake products, making it difficult to find what truly works for you.
home.solutionDescription: We provide a curated selection of genuine products and professional consultations, making it easier to find the right products, learn how to use them, and feel more confident in your beauty choices.
home.testimonial2Quote: The UI is clean and the features are exactly what we needed.
home.heroSubtitle2: Allure is a comprehensive system for beauty product sales and makeup consultation services.
home.featureFlashSaleDesc: Easily create and manage timed promotions.
home.process1Desc: Complete registration and verify your email.
home.process2Desc: Provide necessary information and agree to the terms.
home.process3Desc: Book a suitable appointment with support staff.

flashSale.title: Flash Sale
flashSale.waiting: Flash Sale will take place on {{val, MM/DD/YYYY HH:mm:ss}}

footer.contactTitle: Discover nature's beauty with our natural care products.

cart.netRevenueDescription: Net Revenue = Total payment + Discount from platform vouchers - Commission Fee
cart.comissionFeeDescription: Commission Fee = (Total payment + Discount from platform vouchers) * Commission Rate
cart.title: Cart
cart.checkoutDescription: (This price includes VAT, but does not include shipping fees)
cart.acceptCondition: By clicking "Place Order", you agree to comply with the
cart.soldOutMessage: This product classification is sold out, please choose another.
cart.hiddenMessage: This product classification is hidden, please choose another.
cart.maxQuantityError: The remaining quantity of this product classification is {{maxQuantity}}.
cart.negativeQuantityError: The quantity cannot be less than 1.
cart.addToCartSuccess: The product has been added to your cart.
cart.tmpTotalProductPrice: Estimated price (when applying the vouchers above)
cart.voucherNote: *Please add vouchers at the checkout step to receive the price mentioned above
cart.buyToDiscountCurrency: Spend {{minOrder, currency}} to get a discount of {{discount, currency}}. Limited number of vouchers available
cart.buyToDiscountPercentage: Spend {{minOrder, currency}} to get a discount of {{discount}}%. Limited number of vouchers available

address.title: Address
address.updateSuccess: Your address has been successfully updated!
address.profileAddressDescription: Manage your saved addresses for faster checkout and seamless deliveries.

voucher.title: Voucher
voucher.chooseProductBrandAlert: Please choose at least one product from the brand to apply vouchers.
voucher.chooseProductAppAlert: Please choose at least one product to use vouchers.
voucher.howToUseDescription: To apply an Allure Voucher code, click the "Save" button to claim the voucher and check it in your voucher wallet.
voucher.howToFindDescription: You can find Allure Vouchers throughout the website and app. Here's a tip: start with the promotion pages and the brand's homepage!

off.specificDescription: Applicable for certain specific products of {{val}} in the promotion.

voucher.bestDiscountAmountDisplay: Voucher for up to {{amount, currency}} off

reason.notApplicable: This voucher is not applicable to the selected items or does not meet the usage conditions.
reason.soldOut: This voucher is no longer valid because the applicable products are out of stock.
reason.notStart: This voucher is not yet valid. Please check the start date and try again later.
reason.minOrder: This voucher requires a minimum order of {{amount, currency}} to be used.

dialog.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.saveCard: We partner with reputable payment service providers to ensure that your card information is safe and secure. Allure will not have access to your card details.
wallet.cvvDescription: CVV is a 3-digit verification code printed on the back of your credit card.
wallet.availableBalanceHint: Available balance is the amount you can currently withdraw, excluding any pending transactions.
wallet.noWalletDescription: You haven't created any wallet yet. Start managing your finances by creating a new wallet.

withdraw.addBankAccountFirst: Please add a bank account before making a withdrawal
withdraw.withdrawalNote: Withdrawal requests are typically processed within 1-3 business days. The actual time when funds appear in your account may vary depending on your bank's processing schedule.
withdraw.successMessage: Your withdrawal request has been successfully submitted and will be processed shortly. You can track the status in your withdrawal history.
withdraw.errorMessage: We couldn't process your withdrawal request at this time. Please check your information and try again later.

bankAccounts.title: Bank Accounts
bankAccounts.addYourFirst: Add your first bank account to get started
bankAccounts.deleteSuccessDescription: Your bank account has been removed from your profile
bankAccounts.deleteErrorDescription: There was a problem deleting your bank account. Please try again.
bankAccounts.defaultError: Failed to update default bank account
bankAccounts.defaultSuccessDescription: Your default bank account has been updated successfully
bankAccounts.defaultErrorDescription: There was a problem updating your default bank account. Please try again.
bankAccounts.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this bank account? This action cannot be undone.

order.successDescription: We will receive an order confirmation email with details of your order and a link to track it's progress.
order.failureDescription: Unfortunately, we were unable to process your order. Please try again later or contact support for assistance.
order.cancelOrderDescription: Clicking "Confirm" button means canceling all items in the order, and this action cannot be undone. Promotional codes (if any) can still be applied{{brand}} to other orders after canceling this one.
order.requestCancelOrderDescription: Since the order is being prepared, this request will need to be reviewed before cancellation. Clicking "Confirm" button means submitting a request to cancel all items in this order. This action cannot be undone. Promotional codes (if any) can still be applied to other orders after canceling this one.

cancelOrderReason.productChange: Change in product details (color, size, quantity)

cancelOrderReasonByAdmin.sellerRestricted: Seller account is suspended or restricted.
cancelOrderReasonByAdmin.systemError: System error in processing the order.

order.cancelRequestPendingMessage: Your cancellation request has been submitted and is awaiting confirmation. The order will remain active until the brand reviews and approves the request. We will update you with the result within {{count}} days. If your request is approved, we will process a refund (if applicable).
order.cancelRequestRejectedMessage: Your cancellation request has been rejected. The order will continue to be processed as usual. You can click "Return order" after receiving the item if needed. Please contact customer support if you need further assistance.

statusDescription.joinGroupBuying: The customer has joined a group-buying deal. The order will be processed once the required number of participants is reached.
statusDescription.pending: The order has been placed but is awaiting payment. The customer needs to complete the payment to proceed.
statusDescription.waitConfirm: The order is awaiting confirmation from the brand.
statusDescription.shipping: The order is packed and ready for shipment. Awaiting carrier pickup.
statusDescription.preparingOrder: The order has been confirmed, and the warehouse is currently processing and packing the items.
statusDescription.delivering: The order has been shipped and is in transit to the customer.
statusDescription.delivered: The order has been successfully delivered to the customer's address.
statusDescription.completed: The customer has confirmed receipt of the order, and the transaction is finalized.
statusDescription.cancelled: The refund has been processed and issued to the customer.
statusDescription.returning: The customer has requested a return, and the order is awaiting pickup. The brand must arrange for a shipper to collect the order from the customer and update the status within {{count}} day(s); otherwise, the system will automatically update the status to "Received". If the brand clicks the "Haven't Received" button, the time will be extended. If there is an issue, the brand can submit a complaint.
statusDescription.refunded: The order has been canceled and will not be processed or shipped.
statusDescription.brandReceived: The returned order has been successfully received by the brand and is awaiting further review. If a complaint is filed, the support team will review and resolve the issue. If the brand does not file a complaint, the coins will be refunded to the customer's wallet within {{count}} days from the date the return was received. After this period, the brand will no longer be able to file a complaint.
statusDescription.returnFailed: The return process was unsuccessful due to issues such as incorrect return shipment, damaged item upon return, or failure to meet return conditions. Further action may be required.

order.CancelOrderRequestBrandMessage: The customer has requested to cancel the order. Please review and respond. You can either approve the cancellation or reject it to proceed with the order.
order.approvedCancelRequest: Cancellation approved. Order is now canceled.

returnOrderDialog.title: Return Order Request
returnOrderDialog.description: By clicking 'Request Return,' you agree to return all items in this order. Once approved, this action cannot be undone.
returnOrderDialog.successDescription: We will process your request within the next {{count}} days and notify you of the results as soon as possible. Thank you for trusting our service.
returnOrderDialog.mediaFilesNotes: Please provide clear images and videos that accurately show the product's condition, order ID, and packaging status. A video of the unboxing process is recommended to support the review.

order.returnRequestApprovedMessage: Your return request has been approved. Please prepare, pack, and ship the item within {{count}} days. Remember to keep clear photos and videos as proof of the product's condition and packaging.

rejectCancelOrderReason.SHIPPED: The order is in transit and cannot be canceled.
rejectCancelOrderReason.PROCESSED: The order has already been processed and is ready for shipment.
rejectCancelOrderReason.MULTIPLE_ATTEMPTS: Multiple cancellation attempts detected, violating our cancellation policy.
rejectCancelOrderReason.SUSPICIOUS_ACTIVITY: This cancellation request appears to be fraudulent or suspicious.

toast.success: Your request has been successfully processed, continue with your work.
toast.error: An error occurred while processing your request, please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact the support team.
toast.info: This is a message to provide important additional information related to your work.
toast.warning: You are about to perform a unsafe action, please be cautious. If you are not sure, please contact the support team.

productCart.title: Remove item
productCart.description: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your cart?
productCart.success: Item has been successfully removed from your cart.

cart.title: Remove {{amount}} items
cart.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{amount}} items from your cart? This action cannot be undone.
cart.success: {{amount}} items have been removed from your cart. You can continue shopping to add new items.

cart.title: No items selected
cart.description: You have not selected any items in your cart for checkout. Please select at least one item to proceed.
cart.insufficientStockDescription: Some items you selected in your cart have insufficient stock: {{products}}. Please update your cart to continue.
cart.soldOutDescription: Some items you selected in your cart are sold out: {{products}}. Please deselect these items to proceed.

validation.tagRequired: Slug must be at least 3 characters.
validation.tagRequiredMax: Slug must be less than 100 characters.
validation.tagRegex: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.
validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number

password.minLength: Password must be at least {{minLength}} characters long
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.special: Password must contain at least one special character

validation.min: Please enter a value greater than or equal to {{min}}
validation.max: Please enter a value less than or equal to {{max}}
validation.minMax: Please enter a value between {{min}} and {{max}}
validation.requiredOne: Please select at least one option
validation.fileSize: File size must be less than {{size}}MB
validation.emailValid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.usernameHelper: Username must start with a letter, be 3–20 characters, and use only letters, numbers, or underscores
validation.passwordValid: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
validation.phoneValid: Please fill in a valid phone number
validation.arrayRequired: Field value must be an array
validation.stringOrArrayRequired: Field value must be a string or an array
validation.fileCountValid: You can upload up to {{count}} files
validation.ratingFeedback: The rating must be between 1 and 5
validation.contentFeedback: The feedback content must be at least {{minLength}} characters long but no more than {{maxLength}} characters
validation.maxImagesExceeded: You can upload a maximum of {{count}} images.
validation.maxVideosExceeded: You can upload a maximum of {{count}} videos.
validation.inputMedia: Please upload at least one image or video.
validation.files: Files must be in a supported format and within the allowed size limit.
validation.videoBrowser: Your browser does not support the video tag.
validation.fileTypeLimits: You can upload up to {{imageCount}} images and {{videoCount}} videos.
validation.maxImages: You can only upload up to {{count}} images.
validation.maxVideos: You can only upload up to {{count}} videos.
validation.contentReplyFeedback: The feedback reply must be at least {{minLength}} characters long but no more than {{maxLength}} characters
validation.videosRequired: Please upload at least one video.
validation.imagesRequired: Please upload at least one image.

productFormMessage.SKURequired: Product classification SKU cannot be duplicate
productFormMessage.SKUValidate: SKU is required and must be 6-8 characters.
productFormMessage.SKUValidateFull: Invalid SKU, can only contain letters, numbers, "-" and "_" with length 6-8 characters.
productFormMessage.SKURegex: SKU can only contain letters, numbers, "-" and "_" and must be 6-8 characters.
productFormMessage.quantityRequired: Quantity is required when no product classifications are provided.
productFormMessage.priceRequired: Price is required when no product classifications are provided.
productFormMessage.productNameLengthRequired: Product name must be less than 120 characters.
productFormMessage.imagesRequired: Please select at least one image.
productFormMessage.successCreateOfficialMessage: Product created successfully! It is active and visible on the website after moderator approval.
productFormMessage.successUpdateOfficialMessage: Product updated successfully! It is active and visible on the website after moderator approval.
productFormMessage.successCreateInactiveMessage: Product created successfully! It is currently inactive and will not be visible until activated.
productFormMessage.successUpdateInactiveMessage: Product updated successfully! It is currently inactive and will not be visible until activated.
productFormMessage.totalQuantityTooLow: The total quantity is too low. Please increase the quantity to meet the required minimum: {{count}}.

createProduct.successOfficialDescription: The product is active and visible on the website after moderator approval.
createProduct.successInactiveDescription: The product is currently unpublished and will not be visible until activated.
createProduct.title: Create Product
createProduct.pleaseChooseCategoryToViewInformation: Please select a category to view details
createProduct.pleaseChooseProductToViewInformation: Please select a product to view details
createProduct.reachMaxFiles: You have reached the maximum number of files allowed
createProduct.uniqueNameClassification: Each option in the same classification must have a unique name.
createProduct.certificateDescription: Beauty products must include a valid certificate (e.g., ISO, GMP, FDA) to ensure safety and compliance. This can be a product safety report or regulatory approval document.

statusDescription.ACTIVE: The product is available for purchase and ready to be ordered.
statusDescription.INACTIVE: The product is currently inactive and not visible to customers.
statusDescription.PRE_ORDER: The product is not yet released or out of stock but can be ordered in advance.
statusDescription.OFFICIAL: The product is an officially verified item from the brand or manufacturer and has been reviewed by the platform moderator.
statusDescription.OUT_OF_STOCK: The product is temporarily unavailable due to no remaining stock.
statusDescription.SOLD_OUT: This product is currently out of stock. Restock now so customers can continue purchasing!
statusDescription.BANNED: This product has been removed from the platform due to policy or regulatory violations. It is currently unavailable for purchase and not visible to customers. Administrator or Operator can lift the ban, after which the product will transition to an unpublished status.
statusDescription.FLASH_SALE: This product is part of a limited-time flash sale, offering exclusive discounts to boost sales. Brand should ensure stock availability and competitive pricing, while the platform monitors performance and compliance throughout the promotion.
statusDescription.UN_PUBLISHED: This product is currently unpublished and not visible to customers. Brand should check for required actions to relist the product if necessary.

createProduct.updateProductClassificationQuantitySucce: Product quantity have been successfully updated!

systemService.name: Service Name
systemService.title: Title
systemService.imagesRequired: Please select at least one image.
systemService.standardOrPremiumRequired: Please select a standard or premium type.
systemService.sectionsRequired: Please add at least one section.
systemService.eitherConsultationCriteriaOrDataRequired: Please select an existing consultation criteria or create a new one.
systemService.selectOrCreateNew: Select an existing consultation criteria or create a new one
systemService.alsoUsedFor: This consultation criteria also used for the following system services

statusDescription.ACTIVE: The system service is currently visible in the system, and consultants can register.
statusDescription.INACTIVE: The system service is currently hidden from the system, and consultant registration is disabled.

contact.description: We're here to help! Whether you have questions about our beauty consulting services, need support with an order, or are interested in joining our platform as a beauty consultant, our team is ready to assist.

feedback.successDescription: Thank you for your review! Your review helps other customers make informed decisions and supports brands in improving their products.
feedback.successRepDescription: Your response has been successfully submitted. Thank you for addressing customer feedback!
feedback.mediaFilesHint: You are allowed to upload a maximum of {{videoCount}} video(s) and {{imageCount}} image(s), provided that the total file size remains within {{size}}MB. Please ensure your files are in one of the supported formats: {{format}}.

imagesHint.TO_SHIP: Show order contents, packaging, shipping label.
imagesHint.SHIPPING: Provide proof of handing the package to the shipping carrier.
imagesHint.DELIVERED: Show outer package, product inside, any visible damage (if any).
imagesHint.RETURNING: Provide evidence of the return process.
imagesHint.REFUNDED: Upload proof of return completion and refund.

videosHint.TO_SHIP: A 360° view of the package to confirm it's properly sealed.
videosHint.SHIPPING: Record handover moment or a short clip of the sealed package before shipping.
videosHint.DELIVERED: Unboxing video to capture package condition & item accuracy.
videosHint.RETURNING: Record defect/missing parts/issues clearly for verification.
videosHint.REFUNDED: Upload video of return completion and refund.

media.uploadHint: Click or drag files to upload

description.TO_SHIP: Please upload images and videos of the packaged order before shipping. This helps ensure accurate order fulfillment and reduce disputes.
description.SHIPPING: Upload images and videos of the package as it is handed over to the shipping carrier. This helps track the shipment condition and prevent delivery issues.
description.DELIVERED: Please upload images and videos of the delivered package. This helps confirm the product condition and support dispute resolution if needed.
description.RETURNING: Upload images and videos showing the returned product's condition and packaging. This helps ensure a smooth return process and verify item eligibility for refund.
description.REFUNDED: Please upload images and videos confirming the successful return and refund process. This ensures proper documentation and avoids misunderstandings.
description.COMPLAINT: Please upload images and videos as evidence to support your complaint regarding the returned order. This helps verify the issue and assist in resolving disputes effectively.

orderEvidence.TO_SHIP: Upload Images & Videos for Order Preparation
orderEvidence.SHIPPING: Upload Proof of Handover to Carrier

productClassification.title: Confirm Changes to Product Classification Attributes
productClassification.description: You are modifying important classification attributes such as color, size, or other factors. To ensure accurate inventory management, ordering, and order processing, the current classification will be deactivated. A new classification will be created with the updated attributes once you submit the form. Are you sure you want to proceed? You can cancel before submitting to retain the current classification. Note: This action cannot be undone after submission.

decisionReturn.title: Confirm Return Order Decision
decisionReturn.description: The customer has requested a return for this order.

viewReturn.title: Confirm Return Order Decision
viewReturn.description: The customer has submitted a return request for this order.
viewReturn.admin: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Request

decisionRejectReturn.title: Review Return Order Request Rejection
decisionRejectReturn.description: The brand has rejected the customer's return request. Please review the details of the request and the brand's reason for rejection. You can either approve or reject the rejection. If you reject the request, please provide a reason, the brand and customer will be notified.
decisionRejectReturn.admin: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Request

decisionComplaint.title: Review Complaint Request
decisionComplaint.description: The brand has submitted a complaint regarding the return order. Please review the complaint details and the brand's reason for the request. You can either approve or reject the complaint. If you reject the complaint, please provide a reason, and both the brand will be notified.
decisionComplaint.admin: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Complaint
decisionComplaint.brand: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Complaint

returnTrackView.title: Return Order Details
returnTrackView.description: Below is the detailed information on the return review process.
returnTrackView.admin: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Request

complaintTrackView.title: Complaint Details
complaintTrackView.description: Below is the detailed information on the complaint review process.
complaintTrackView.admin: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Complaint
complaintTrackView.brand: Admin's Decision on the Brand's Complaint

rejectComplaintReason.missingEvidence: The brand did not provide sufficient evidence to support the complaint.
rejectComplaintReason.insufficientJustification: The complaint reason provided by the brand is not valid.
rejectComplaintReason.policyCompliance: The complaint violates the platform's policies.
rejectComplaintReason.validReturnRequest: The customer's return request was valid, and the complaint is unjustified.
rejectComplaintReason.delayedSubmission: The complaint was submitted after the allowed timeframe.

return.returnRequestApprovedView: Your return request has been approved. Press the "View" button to review the processing details.

rejectBrandRejectionReason.validReturnRequest: The customer's return request is valid and meets platform policies
rejectBrandRejectionReason.insufficientJustification: The brand's reason for rejecting the return request is not sufficiently justified
rejectBrandRejectionReason.missingEvidence: The brand did not provide enough evidence to support the rejection
rejectBrandRejectionReason.policyCompliance: The return request aligns with the platform's return policy
rejectBrandRejectionReason.customerProtection: Decision made in favor of customer protection and fair resolution
rejectBrandRejectionReason.escalationRequired: Further escalation or review is needed before rejecting the return request

return.successMakeDecisionOnComplaint: The complaint request has been successfully processed!
return.rejectComplaintMessage: Press "Confirm" to reject the brand's complaint request.
return.rejectRequestRejectOrderMessage: Pressing "Confirm" means rejecting the brand's request. The customer will receive a notification to pack and return the item to the brand.
return.returnRequestPendingMessageCustomer: Your return request is being reviewed. We will notify you of the decision within {{count}} days. Please check your notifications for updates.
return.returnRequestRejectedMessageCustomer: Unfortunately, your return request has been rejected. Please check the provided reason in your return details. If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.

returnOrderEvidenceDialog.title: Upload Return Shipment Evidence
returnOrderEvidenceDialog.description: Please provide clear proof of your return shipment, including images or videos of the packaged item and the shipping receipt. This helps ensure a smooth return process.
returnOrderEvidenceDialog.mediaFilesNotes: Ensure that your photos or videos clearly show the product's condition, packaging, and shipping label. A video recording of the packing and shipping process is recommended for verification.
returnOrderEvidenceDialog.returnOrderShipmentSuccessMessage: You have successfully submitted your return shipment details. We will review the provided evidence and update you on the next steps. Please keep your shipping receipt and tracking information for reference.

rejectReturnOrderReason.notEligible: The product is not eligible for return
rejectReturnOrderReason.noValidReason: The provided return reason is not valid
rejectReturnOrderReason.insufficientEvidence: Insufficient proof or evidence provided for the claim
rejectReturnOrderReason.policyViolation: The return request violates platform return policy
rejectReturnOrderReason.damagedByCustomer: The product was damaged due to customer misuse
rejectReturnOrderReason.usedOrAltered: The product has been used, or altered from its original state
rejectReturnOrderReason.discountedOrFinalSale: Item is a final sale or non-returnable promotional product

complaintReturnOrderReason.wrongItemReturned: The returned item does not match the original order
complaintReturnOrderReason.usedOrDamaged: The product has been used or is not in its original condition
complaintReturnOrderReason.missingParts: Returned item is missing parts, accessories, or original packaging
complaintReturnOrderReason.fakeOrDifferentProduct: The returned item is counterfeit or different from what was purchased
complaintReturnOrderReason.damagedPackaging: The product packaging is damaged beyond acceptable condition
complaintReturnOrderReason.returnAbuse: Customer has a history of excessive or fraudulent returns
complaintReturnOrderReason.expiredReturn: The return was received after the allowed return period

rejectReturnOrderDialog.title: Reject Return Request
rejectReturnOrderDialog.description: Please provide a valid reason for rejecting this return request. If applicable, attach supporting evidence to justify your decision. This information will be reviewed before finalizing the rejection.
rejectReturnOrderDialog.mediaFilesNotes: Ensure that any uploaded images or videos clearly support your decision, such as product condition, missing packaging, or policy violations.

return.complaintSuccess: Your complaint has been submitted successfully!
return.mediaFilesNotesComplaint: Ensure that any uploaded images or videos clearly show the reason for the complaint, such as the condition of the product upon receipt, damages, missing items, or other issues related to the returned order.
return.rejectReturnSuccessMessage: You have successfully rejected the return request. Our support team will review this decision and provide you with the final result as soon as possible.
return.rejectReturnRequestPendingMessageBrand: Your request to reject the return is being reviewed by our support team. We will notify you once a final decision is made within approximately {{count}} days.
return.rejectReturnRequestApprovedMessageBrand: Your request to reject the return has been approved. The customer will be notified accordingly.
return.rejectReturnRequestRejectedMessageBrand: Your request to reject the return has been denied. The return request will proceed as approved.
return.returnRequestPendingMessageAdmin: The customer has requested a return for this order. The brand will review and decide. You can check the platform's return policy for guidance.
return.successMakeDecisionOnReject: Successfully processed the brand's return rejection request!
return.returnOrderRequestMessage: The brand has declined the customer's return request. Please review all relevant details and platform policies before making a final decision within {{count}} day(s).
return.returnOrderRequestMessageBrand: A customer has requested a return for this order. You can review the request and make a decision. If no action is taken within {{count}} days, the request will be automatically approved. If approved, the customer will proceed with shipping the return. If rejected, the admin will review and make the final decision.
return.complaintRequestPendingMessageBrand: Your complaint request has been submitted and is awaiting review by the admin/operator. You will receive a resolution within {{count}} day(s).
return.complaintRequestApprovedMessageBrand: Your complaint has been approved by the admin/operator. Further actions will be processed accordingly.
return.complaintRequestRejectedMessageBrand: Your complaint has been rejected by the admin/operator. The coins will be refunded to the customer's wallet.
return.complaintRequestPendingMessageAdmin: Brand has submitted a complaint regarding a returned order. Please review and make a decision within {{count}} day(s).
return.complaintRequestApprovedMessageAdmin: You have approved the brand's complaint. Necessary actions will be processed accordingly.
return.complaintRequestRejectedMessageAdmin: You have rejected the brand's complaint. The coins will be refunded to the customer's wallet.
return.complaintRequestApprovedMessageCustomer: The brand's complaint has been approved by the admin. You will not receive a coin refund for this order. You can review the complaint details and contact the support team if needed.
return.returnRequestApprovedMessageBrand: The customer's return request has been approved. The customer will return the order within {{count}} day(s). After the customer updates the status to "Returning", please arrange for a shipper to pick up the order from the customer

booking.serviceBookingFormDescription: Please fill out this form to complete your booking

statusDescription.waitConfirm: Your booking is waiting for confirmation from the service provider. You will be notified once it's confirmed.
statusDescription.confirmed: Your booking has been confirmed. The service provider is ready to deliver the service as scheduled.
statusDescription.completed: The service has been successfully completed. Thank you for using our service!
statusDescription.cancelled: This booking has been cancelled. Please contact support if you have any questions.
statusDescription.toPay: Payment is required to proceed with this booking. Please complete the payment to continue.
statusDescription.formSubmitted: Your service booking form has been submitted successfully. We are reviewing your information.
statusDescription.resultSheetSent: The result sheet for your service has been sent. You can view the detailed results now.
statusDescription.refunded: The payment for this booking has been refunded to your original payment method.
statusDescription.waitForConfirmation: Your booking is waiting for confirmation from the consultant.
statusDescription.bookingConfirmed: Your booking has been confirmed. Please submit the booking form to proceed.
statusDescription.serviceBookingFormSubmitted: Your booking form has been submitted. Please join the consulting call at the scheduled time.
statusDescription.completedConsultingCall: The consulting call has been completed. Waiting for the result sheet.
statusDescription.sendedResultSheet: The result sheet has been sent. Please review and mark as completed.

booking.completeConsultationDescription: Please fill in your evaluation for each section and suggest products for the customer based on your consultation.
booking.imagesHint: Upload up to 3 images to support your evaluation
booking.completeConsultingCallDescription: Please provide details about the consulting call completion including any relevant media files and notes.
booking.videosHint: Upload videos related to the consulting call
booking.resultNoteDescription: Add any additional notes or observations from the consulting call

rejectCancel.title: Cancel Request Rejected
rejectCancel.message: Please provide a reason for rejecting the request.

createBlog.title: Title
createBlog.successPublishedDescription: Blog is now live and visible to everyone
createBlog.successInactiveDescription: Blog has been saved as inactive and won't be visible
createBlog.author: Author

updateBlog.title: Title
updateBlog.successPublishedDescription: Blog changes are now live and visible to everyone
updateBlog.successInactiveDescription: Blog changes have been saved but won't be visible

backendError.usernameRequired: Username is required and must be at least 3 characters long
backendError.invalidUsername: User name should starting with a letter, 3-20 characters and can contain letters, numbers and underscores
backendError.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
backendError.invalidPhone: Phone must be a string with 10 to 15 digits
backendError.invalidDob: Date of birth must be a valid date (YYYY-MM-DD)
backendError.fullNameMaxLength: String must contain at most 100 character(s)
backendError.phoneMaxLength: Phone must contain at most 100 character(s)
backendError.districtMaxLength: District must contain at most 100 character(s)
backendError.wardMaxLength: Ward must contain at most 100 character(s)
backendError.provinceMaxLength: Province must contain at most 255 character(s)
backendError.invalidStartTime: Start time must be a valid date string
backendError.invalidEndTime: End time must be a valid date string
backendError.totalPriceNonNegative: Number must be greater than or equal to 0
backendError.certificateNotAllowed: Certificate is only available for role CONSULTANT and KOL
backendError.exceededApprovedReportsLimit: Account has been banned due to exceeding the approved reports limit
backendError.atLeastOneDefaultAddress: Should be at least one default address
backendError.loginMethodNotAllowed: User must login by another way not using password
backendError.cannotCompleteBooking: You cannot complete the booking because the report has not been completed yet.
backendError.cannotCancelBooking: Can not cancelled booking in status:
backendError.onlyConsultantOrOperator: Only apply for consultant or operator
backendError.alreadyBookedSlot: You have already booked a slot. Please wait for process
backendError.noItemsFoundForIds: No items found for the provided IDs
backendError.noItemsInCart: No items found in the cart for the given account
backendError.maxCategoryLevelExceeded: A category cannot have more than 4 levels of subcategories
backendError.systemServiceNotFoundOrInactive: System service not found or inactive.
backendError.activeServicesUsingFormNotFound: No active services using this form found.
backendError.criteriaSectionUpdateFailed: Failed to update Consultation Criteria Section.
backendError.classificationQuantityRequired: Product classification must have at least one quantity.
backendError.invalidTimeRange: Start time must be earlier than end time
backendError.overlappingPreOrderEvent: The time range overlaps with an existing pre-order event
backendError.overlappingDiscountEvent: The time range overlaps with an existing discount event
backendError.classificationQuantityInvalid: Classification quantity must be greater than 0!
backendError.invalidClassificationQuantity: Invalid classification quantity: Quantity should be smaller than the current stock
backendError.updateOrderIndexFailed: Failed to update order index for questions
backendError.imageDeleteFailed: Failed to delete image associated with the question
backendError.activeServicesUsingCriteriaNotFound: No active services using this criteria found.
backendError.imageUpdateFailed: Failed to update image associated with the system service

payment.notifyPayment: This order has not been paid. Waiting for the customer to complete the payment of {{total}} via {{method}} within {{val}}.
payment.methodMessage: For group-buying purchases, the default payment method is wallet. The amount will be automatically deducted once the group order is successfully completed. Please ensure your wallet has sufficient available balance to avoid any transaction interruptions.

authLayout.testimonial: "Allure Portal is a powerful tool that allows us to manage our data, grant access to our clients and partners, and monitor the performance of our business in real-time. It's a game-changer for us."

descriptions.signIn: Enter your email and password to sign in!

descriptions.updatePassword: Choose a new password for your account!

descriptions.emailVerification: Check your email & click the link to activate your account.

branchCreation.description: Create, grow, and manage your brand on our powerful selling platform. Start your journey to success today!

document.label: Document
document.uploadDescription: You must upload at least 1 document for your license details. To help you, we've provided a template file. Please download it, fill in the necessary details, and upload it back:

dragDrop.fileRestrictions: You can upload up to {{maxFiles}} files. Accepted file formats are {{formats}}. Each file must be under {{maxSize}}MB.
dragDrop.maxFilesReached: You have reached the maximum number of files allowed

businessRegistrationCode.description: A number or code assigned to the business upon registration, serving as a formal identifier for the company.

businessRegistrationAddress.label: Business Registration Address

confirmation.reviewMessage: Please review the information before submitting, you can go back to refill the form if there is any mistake.

scheduleMeeting.pageDescription: Schedule a meeting with a system operator to complete your brand registration process.
scheduleMeeting.alertDescription: This meeting is a required step to verify your brand information and complete the registration process. The system operator will review your application and answer any questions you may have.

reviewerInfo.title: Reviewer Information
reviewerInfo.about: The reviewer will verify your brand information, explain the platform features, and help you complete the registration process.

scheduleForm.title: Schedule Your Registration Meeting
scheduleForm.description: Please select a date and time for your meeting with the system operator to complete your brand registration.

step1.title: Select Meeting Date
step1.label: Available Dates
step1.tooltip: Choose a date for your registration meeting. Only available dates are selectable.
step1.description: Registration meetings are available on weekdays for the next 30 days.

step2.title: Select Time Slot
step2.label: Available Times for {{date}}
step2.tooltip: Choose a time slot that works best for your schedule.
step2.noSlots: No available slots for this date.
step2.selectAnother: Please select another date to see available times.

step3.title: Additional Information
step3.label: Notes for the System Operator (Optional)
step3.tooltip: Add any questions or information you'd like to discuss during the registration meeting.
step3.placeholder: Add any questions about the registration process, specific requirements, or topics you'd like to discuss during the meeting
step3.description: This information will help the system operator prepare for your registration meeting.

messages.success: Your registration meeting has been scheduled successfully!
messages.noSlotSelected: Error there is no slot selected
messages.failedSchedule: Failed to schedule meeting. Please try again.
messages.failedDescription: There was an error processing your request.

detail.title: Group Buying Details
detail.noProducts: No products in this group buying

consultant.netRevenueDescription: Net Revenue = Total payment  - Commission Fee
consultant.comissionFeeDescription: Commission Fee = Total payment * Commission Rate
